TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CoordinateSpace extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the system to use when evaluating coordinates.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CoordinateSpace Device = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies that coordinates are in the device coordinate context. On a computer screen the device coordinates are usually measured in pixels.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CoordinateSpace Page = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that coordinates are in the page coordinate context. Their units are defined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> property, and must be one of the elements of the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CoordinateSpace World = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that coordinates are in the world coordinate context. World coordinates are used in a nonphysical environment, such as a modeling environment.
